main event: A witness observed a rapidly moving green object in the sky on November 24, 1957.
interesting points: The object moved in irregular pulsations across the sky., The size of the object was estimated to be 3-4 times that of a star., No sound was heard during the sighting., The event lasted for 2-3 minutes., The sighting was corroborated by the witness's wife and daughter at the same time and location.
sighted object: a green object in the sky
witness description: the observer and his family (wife and daughter)
